Reclusa::

She grinned at the thought of her enemies being defeated once and for
all.  But what then?  She started to formulate a plan for her future.
But first things first, defeat the Maxmials, then tent to other
business.  
"So, if this Unicron is that big of a threat that we must join with
the Maximals to defeat it....then we must use this to our advantage. 
We must come up with a plan so that we may be able to wipe both this,
Unicron and the Maximals in one stroke. Question is, what will give
them sufficient cause to sacrifice themselves to destroy this threat?
Hmmm, makes one wonder."

ordet to destroy that menace... and that are giving us time to plan
something to defeat Maximals... forever"
